metadata.description: Automated validation results for firewall rules checking security, compliance, best practices, and configuration issues

validations.check_description: Validates that inbound rules do not allow unrestricted access (0.0.0.0/0) to sensitive ports
validations.expected_value: Restricted source CIDR or security group
validations.exception_reason: Public web server - 0.0.0.0/0 is expected for port 443

validations.check_description: Validates that inbound rules do not allow unrestricted access (0.0.0.0/0) to sensitive ports
validations.expected_value: Restricted source CIDR (VPN or bastion only)
validations.remediation: Restrict SSH access to VPN CIDR 10.100.0.0/16 or bastion security group sg-bastion

validations.check_description: Validates that inbound rules do not allow unrestricted access (0.0.0.0/0) to sensitive ports
validations.remediation: Restrict RDP access to VPN CIDR 10.100.0.0/16 or use Azure Bastion/AWS SSM

validations.check_description: Validates that database ports are only accessible from application tiers
validations.expected_value: Source restricted to application security groups

validations.check_description: Validates that database ports are only accessible from application tiers
validations.remediation: Change source from '*' to 'asg-webapp' or 'asg-api' application security groups

validations.check_description: Validates that rules do not allow any-to-any traffic without restrictions
validations.expected_value: Specific source, destination, application, and service
validations.actual_value: Source: any, Dest: any, App: any, Service: any
validations.remediation: Replace with specific rules for required traffic flows. Remove this overly permissive rule.

validations.check_description: Validates that all rules have meaningful descriptions
validations.actual_value: Allow Redis access from web tier for session caching

validations.check_description: Validates that all rules have meaningful descriptions
validations.remediation: Add description: 'Allow application traffic from [source] for [purpose]'

validations.check_description: Validates that egress rules are restricted to required destinations
validations.expected_value: Egress restricted to specific destinations or services
validations.remediation: Consider restricting egress to specific destinations. Implement egress filtering for sensitive workloads.

validations.check_description: Validates DMZ architecture with restricted database access
validations.expected_value: Web tier in DMZ, databases in private subnet
validations.actual_value: NSG properly segments web and database tiers

validations.check_description: Validates DMZ architecture with restricted database access
validations.expected_value: No direct internet access to cardholder data environment
validations.actual_value: Rule allows Untrust zone to Database zone on port 5432
validations.remediation: Remove direct internet to database rule. Route through application tier in DMZ.

validations.check_description: Validates that port ranges are correctly specified
Validates that port ranges are correctly specified
validations.remediation: Correct port range to valid values (1-65535). Split into multiple rules if needed.

validations.check_description: Identifies duplicate or overlapping rules
validations.actual_value: Duplicate of sgr-dup-rule-002 (same source, port, protocol)
validations.remediation: Remove duplicate rule sgr-dup-rule-002 or consolidate into single rule

validations.check_description: Identifies rules that conflict with each other
validations.expected_value: No conflicting allow/deny rules for same traffic
validations.remediation: Review priority ordering. Higher priority deny rule (100) will block this allow rule (1000).

validations.check_description: Validates that temporary rules are removed after expiration
validations.expected_value: Rule should be disabled or removed after 2025-12-31
validations.actual_value: Rule still active, expired 13 days ago
validations.remediation: Disable or remove expired rule. If still needed, create new change request for extension.

validations.check_description: Validates that all rules have associated change tickets
Validates that all rules have associated change tickets
validations.remediation: Create change ticket documenting rule purpose and approval. Tag rule with ticket number.

validations.check_description: Validates that sensitive services have restricted access
validations.expected_value: Vault access restricted to specific application groups

validations.check_description: Validates that sensitive services have restricted access
validations.expected_value: Vault access restricted to specific application groups
validations.remediation: Restrict Vault access to application network tags only. Remove public access.

validations.check_description: Validates firewall rules restrict inbound and outbound traffic to CDE
validations.expected_value: Traffic limited to payment processing requirements only
validations.actual_value: Source: AG-Payment-Servers, Dest: AG-Payment-Providers, App: ssl

validations.check_description: Validates that port ranges are not excessively wide
validations.remediation: Restrict to specific ports required. Split into multiple rules for different services.

validations.check_description: Validates logical access controls per SOC2 CC6.1
validations.expected_value: Access restricted based on business requirements
validations.actual_value: HTTPS only, appropriate for public web application

validations.check_description: Validates that firewall logging is enabled for audit
Validates that firewall logging is enabled for audit
validations.remediation: Enable logging for audit trail. Consider log sampling for high-volume rules.

validations.check_description: Validates that security profiles are attached to allow rules
validations.actual_value: Profile: Web-Protection (AV, AS, VP, URL, FP)

validations.check_description: Validates that security profiles are attached to allow rules
validations.remediation: Attach appropriate security profile (Internal-Protection or similar)

validations.check_description: Validates rule naming follows organizational standards
Validates rule naming follows organizational standards
validations.remediation: Rename to follow convention, e.g., 'Allow-HTTPS-Inbound-Internet'

validations.check_description: Identifies rules with zero or very low hit counts
Identifies rules with zero or very low hit counts
validations.remediation: Review if rule is still needed. Consider disabling for 30 days before removal.

validations.check_description: Validates ICMP is restricted appropriately
validations.expected_value: ICMP restricted to specific types (echo-request/reply) or internal only
validations.remediation: Restrict to ICMP types 0 and 8 (echo) from internal networks only

validations.check_description: Validates that insecure protocols are not allowed
validations.remediation: Migrate to SSH (port 22). Remove Telnet rule after migration.

validations.check_description: Validates that insecure protocols are not allowed
validations.expected_value: No unencrypted FTP (port 21), use SFTP instead
validations.remediation: Migrate partners to SFTP (port 22) or FTPS (port 990). Update partner documentation.

validations.check_description: Validates that HTTP is redirected to HTTPS
validations.expected_value: HTTP redirected to HTTPS or blocked
validations.exception_reason: Internal applications not yet migrated to HTTPS
validations.remediation: Plan migration of internal applications to HTTPS. Block HTTP after migration.

validations.check_description: Validates personal firewall on mobile/employee-owned devices
Validates use of service tags for Azure services

validations.expected_value: Service tag used instead of IP ranges

validations.check_description: Validates use of prefix lists for AWS services

validations.check_description: Validates use of network tags instead of IP ranges
Validates use of address groups instead of individual IPs
Validates use of address groups instead of individual IPs
validations.remediation: Create address group for these hosts and reference group in rule

validations.check_description: Validates self-referencing security group for cluster communication

validations.check_description: Validates SSH access uses Identity-Aware Proxy
Validates temporary rules have expiration dates
validations.expected_value: Expiration date set for temporary rules

validations.remediation: Add expiration date or convert to permanent rule with proper documentation

validations.check_description: Validates application identification is used instead of port-based

validations.expected_value: Application-ID used instead of service ports

validations.check_description: Validates audit/log systems have proper access controls

validations.check_description: Validates no overlapping CIDR ranges in rules
validations.remediation: Use more specific CIDR ranges to avoid overlap confusion

validations.check_description: Validates default deny rule exists at lowest priority
Validates default deny rule exists at end of policy

validations.check_description: Validates DNS rules allow both TCP and UDP
validations.expected_value: DNS on both TCP/53 and UDP/53

validations.check_description: Validates database ports are blocked from internet
Validates dangerous ports are not exposed to internet
validations.remediation: IMMEDIATE: Remove SMB exposure to internet. High risk of exploitation.

validations.check_description: Validates zone protection profiles are applied

validations.check_description: Validates DR site connectivity is properly configured

validations.check_description: Validates adequate priority spacing for future rules
validations.remediation: Consider renumbering priorities with larger gaps (100, 110, 120)

validations.check_description: Validates rule priority order is logical
validations.expected_value: Allow rules have higher priority (lower number) than deny
validations.actual_value: Allow at 2000, Deny at 1000 (deny processed first)
validations.remediation: Adjust priority: Allow rule should be < 1000 to be processed before deny

validations.check_description: Identifies rules shadowed by more general rules above
validations.expected_value: Rule not shadowed by broader rule
validations.remediation: Reorder rules or remove shadowed rule if redundant
